title: Game Devs of Color Expo
summary: An Expo for game devs and gamers of color to engage, network, and have fun!

title: Black Nerd Expo
summary: A space for attendees to explore and celebrate Black books, art, video games, pop culture, science, tech with like-minded individuals.

title: Blerdcon
summary: A celebration of Black Nerds and their contributions to comics, cartoons, anime, gaming, and more!
